title: Apple drops to 7th in U.S. patent rankings for 2025 as grants fall 11%, per report
full_text: Apple drops to 7th in U.S. patent rankings for 2025 as grants fall 11%, per report. A new report shows that U.S. patent activity continued its multi-year decline in 2025, with Apple dropping to seventh place after receiving 2,722 grants, a 11% decrease from 2024. Here are the details. more….
